Class WekaClassifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.edu.icesi.nextfruit.modules.machinelearning.WekaClassifier
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    WekaClassifierAdapter

    public abstract class WekaClassifier
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides methods to handle the classification functionality using the WEKA library.

    JuanD
